name: Gloxan
description:
Curious Altruist
The Gloxan culture values helping others and cherishes freedom. Originally assistants, they have developed a culture of protection, healing, and linguistic mastery.

options.name: Reaction: Protective Ward
options.description: When an ally within 10 units is targeted by a spell, you can create a minor protective ward that grants them +1d4 to their defense roll.

options.name: Helper's Insight
options.description: Gain +1 Insight and you can sense when someone genuinely needs help versus manipulation.

options.name: Medical Knowledge
options.description: Gain +1 Medicine and healing items you create are 25% more effective.
